content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'DimCity' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE wwi.DimCity
	(
	 Column1 nvarchar(30)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_DimCity
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO wwi.DimCity
(Column1 1)
FROM 'https://asablobacct.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/wwi-dimcity.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://asablobacct.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM DimCity
GO
